title: Corning Inc. Shares Drop 7% as Co. Cuts Guidance For Two Segments
text:
By Stephen Nakrosis

Shares of Corning Inc. (GLW) are falling in Monday's after-hours market after the company said it was cutting guidance on its display technologies and optical communications segments.

At 6:18 p.m. ET, the company's shares had fallen 6.82% to trade at $28. After-hours volume topped 77,000 shares.

The company's shares finished the day's regular trading session with a 0.36% loss to close at $30.05.

After the bell Corning said it was cutting its guidance for the two segments, while maintaining guidance for its other three segments. The company also said it plans to engage in cost-cutting measures.
